00048 void Properties::load(const char *fname) throw(std::invalid_argument) {
00049   struct stat statbuf;
00050   char *name, *value, *last, *ptr, *linep;
00051   std::string valstr;
00052 
00053   if (stat(fname, &statbuf) != 0)
00054     throw std::invalid_argument(string("Could not stat properties file '") + fname + "' - " + string(strerror(errno)));
00055 
00056   ifstream ifs(fname);
00057   string line;
00058   while(getline(ifs, line)) {
00059 
00060     linep = (char *)line.c_str();
00061     while (*linep && isspace(*linep))
00062       linep++;
00063 
00064     if (*linep == 0 || *linep == '#')
00065       continue;
00066 
00067     if ((name = strtok_r(linep, "=", &last)) != 0) {
00068       if ((value = strtok_r(0, "=", &last)) != 0) {
00069 
00070         ptr = name + strlen(name);
00071         while (ptr > name && (isspace(*(ptr-1))))
00072           ptr--;
00073 
00074         if (ptr == name)
00075           continue;
00076         *ptr = 0;
00077 
00078         while (*value && isspace(*value))
00079           value++;
00080 
00081         if (*value == 0)
00082           continue;
00083 
00084         ptr = value + strlen(value);
00085         while (ptr > value && (isspace(*(ptr-1))))
00086           ptr--;
00087 
00088         if (ptr == value)
00089           continue;
00090         *ptr = 0;
00091 
00092         if (*value == '\'' && *(ptr-1) == '\'') {
00093           value++;
00094           *(ptr-1) = 0;
00095           if (*value == 0)
00096             continue;
00097         }
00098         else if (*value == '"' && *(ptr-1) == '"') {
00099           value++;
00100           *(ptr-1) = 0;
00101           if (*value == 0)
00102             continue;
00103         }
00104 
00105         valstr = value;
00106 
00107         m_map[name] = valstr;
00108       }
00109     }
00110   }
00111 }

00113 const char *Properties::get(const char *str, const char *defaultval) {
00114   PropertyMap::iterator iter =  m_map.find(str);
00115   if (iter == m_map.end())
00116     return defaultval;
00117   return ((*iter).second.c_str());
00118 }

00124 int64_t Properties::get_int64(const char *str, int64_t defaultval) {
00125 
00126   PropertyMap::iterator iter = m_map.find(str);
00127   if (iter == m_map.end())
00128     return defaultval;
00129 
00130   return parse_int_value(str, (*iter).second);
00131 }
00132 
00133 int Properties::get_int(const char *str, int defaultval) {
00134   int64_t llval = get_int64(str, defaultval);
00135 
00136   if (llval > numeric_limits<int>::max())
00137     throw std::invalid_argument(string("Integer value too large for property '") + str + "'");
00138 
00139   return (int)llval;
00140 }
00141 
00142 bool Properties::get_bool(const char *str, bool defaultval) {
00143   PropertyMap::iterator iter = m_map.find(str);
00144   if (iter == m_map.end())
00145     return defaultval;
00146 
00147   if (!strcasecmp((*iter).second.c_str(), "true") || !strcmp((*iter).second.c_str(), "1"))
00148     return true;
00149   else if (!strcasecmp((*iter).second.c_str(), "false") || !strcmp((*iter).second.c_str(), "0"))
00150     return false;
00151 
00152   HT_ERRORF("Invalid value for property '%s' (%s), using defaultval value", str, (*iter).second.c_str());
00153 
00154   return defaultval;
00155 }

00159 std::string Properties::set(const char *key, const char *value) {
00160   std::string oldval;
00161 
00162   PropertyMap::iterator iter = m_map.find(key);
00163   if (iter != m_map.end())
00164     oldval = (*iter).second;
00165 
00166   m_map[key] = value;
00167 
00168   return oldval;
00169 }

00172 int Properties::set_int(const String &key, int value) {
00173   int64_t old_val = 0;
00174 
00175   if (value > numeric_limits<int>::max())
00176     throw std::invalid_argument(string("Integer value too large for property '") + key + "'");
00177 
00178   PropertyMap::iterator iter = m_map.find(key);
00179   if (iter != m_map.end()) {
00180     old_val = parse_int_value(key, (*iter).second);
00181     if (old_val > numeric_limits<int>::max())
00182       throw std::invalid_argument(string("Integer value too large for property '") + key + "'");
00183   }
00184 
00185   m_map[key] = std::string("") + value;
00186 
00187   return old_val;
00188 }

00191 int64_t Properties::set_int64(const String &key, int64_t value) {
00192   int64_t old_val = 0;
00193 
00194   PropertyMap::iterator iter = m_map.find(key);
00195   if (iter != m_map.end())
00196     old_val = parse_int_value(key, (*iter).second);
00197 
00198   m_map[key] = std::string("") + (long long)value;
00199 
00200   return old_val;
00201 }

00204 int64_t Properties::parse_int_value(const String &key, const String &value) {
00205   const char *ptr;
00206 
00207   for (ptr = value.c_str(); isdigit(*ptr); ptr++)
00208     ;
00209 
00210   uint64_t factor = 1LL;
00211   if (*ptr != 0) {
00212     if (!strcasecmp(ptr, "k"))
00213       factor = 1000LL;
00214     else if (!strcasecmp(ptr, "m"))
00215       factor = 1000000LL;
00216     else if (!strcasecmp(ptr, "g"))
00217       factor = 1000000000LL;
00218     else
00219       throw std::invalid_argument(string("Invalid value for integer property '") + key + "' (value=" + value + ")");
00220   }
00221 
00222   string numstr = string(value.c_str(), ptr-value.c_str());
00223 
00224   int64_t llval = strtoll(numstr.c_str(), 0, 0);
00225   if (llval == 0 && errno == EINVAL)
00226     throw std::invalid_argument(string("Could not convert property '") + key + "' (value=" + value + ") to an integer");
00227 
00228   return llval * factor;
00229 }
